segment.source: The Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) server infrastructure depends on a set of server features that can be installed on one or more server computers, based on the requirements of your enterprise.
segment.target: The Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) server infrastructure depends on a set of server features that can be installed on one or more server computers, based on the requirements of your enterprise.

segment.source: The following MBAM features represent the server infrastructure for an MBAM server deployment:
segment.target: The following MBAM features represent the server infrastructure for an MBAM server deployment:

segment.source: MBAM server databases and features can be installed in different configurations, depending on your scalability needs.
segment.target: MBAM server databases and features can be installed in different configurations, depending on your scalability needs.

segment.source: All MBAM Server features can be installed on a single server or distributed across multiple servers.
segment.target: All MBAM Server features can be installed on a single server or distributed across multiple servers.

segment.source: Generally, we recommend that you use a three-server or five-server configuration for production environments, although configurations of two or four servers can also be used, depending on your computing needs.
segment.target: Generally, we recommend that you use a three-server or five-server configuration for production environments, although configurations of two or four servers can also be used, depending on your computing needs.

segment.source: For more information about performance scalability of MBAM and recommended deployment topologies, see the MBAM Scalability and High-Availability Guide white paper at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=258314.
segment.target: For more information about performance scalability of MBAM and recommended deployment topologies, see the MBAM Scalability and High-Availability Guide white paper at http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=258314.

segment.source: Each MBAM feature has specific prerequisites.
segment.target: Each MBAM feature has specific prerequisites.

segment.source: For a full list of server feature prerequisites and hardware and software requirements, see MBAM 1.0 Deployment Prerequisites and MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.
segment.target: For a full list of server feature prerequisites and hardware and software requirements, see MBAM 1.0 Deployment Prerequisites and MBAM 1.0 Supported Configurations.

segment.source: In addition to the server-related MBAM features, the server Setup application includes an MBAM Group Policy template.
segment.target: In addition to the server-related MBAM features, the server Setup application includes an MBAM Group Policy template.

segment.source: This template can be installed on any computer that is able to run the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).
segment.target: This template can be installed on any computer that is able to run the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC) or Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM).

segment.source: Order of deployment of MBAM Server Features
segment.target: Order of deployment of MBAM Server Features

segment.source: When you deploy the MBAM Server features, install the features in the following order:
segment.target: When you deploy the MBAM Server features, install the features in the following order:

segment.source: Keep track of the names of the computers on which you install each feature.
segment.target: Keep track of the names of the computers on which you install each feature.

segment.source: You will use this information throughout the installation process.
segment.target: You will use this information throughout the installation process.

segment.source: You can print and use a deployment checklist to assist you in the installation process.
segment.target: You can print and use a deployment checklist to assist you in the installation process.

segment.source: For more information about the MBAM deployment checklist, see MBAM 1.0 Deployment Checklist.
segment.target: For more information about the MBAM deployment checklist, see MBAM 1.0 Deployment Checklist.
